title: A dream comes true: Sangupiddy Bridge declares open by President Rajapaksa
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma (Pix by: Sudath Silva) A much waited Sangupiddy dream bridge which links the Northern peninsula to the rest of the country via Pooneryn declared open by President Mahinda Rajapaksa yesterday on 16 January. The Sangupiddy Bridge across the Jaffna lagoon connects Pooneryn from the mainland and Karaitivu in the…
